class_notes: This class is for seniors.  Permission of instructor is required.  Contact Barbara Shannon at barbara.shannon@emory.edu for permission.  This course will prepare you to critically evaluate what you read in the professional and online Medical, Biomedical, Biological, and Ecological literature and will cover a variety of topics.
course_description: A course on topics of special biological interest, designed for Biology majors elective credit. This course is repeatable when the topic varies.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2671, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MWF 1-2:15p, Instructor: B. Levin, Status: Open
